it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class ArrayVarietyScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.PublicObjectiveScore
      • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ArrayVarietyScore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnVarietyScore, RowVarietyScore

    public abstract class ArrayVarietyScore
extends PublicObjectiveScore
    The class that contains a useful method for it's subclasses to see if all elements of an array of cells are different for a certain property.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo
    See Also:
    ColumnVarietyScore, RowVarietyScore

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class it.polimi.se2018.controller.PublicObjectiveScore

        propertyIsColour, victoryPoints

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean allDifferentValues(Cell[] cellArray)
      The method that controls if in an array of Cells all values or colours of the dice are different, and there are no empty cells.

      • Methods inherited from class it.polimi.se2018.controller.PublicObjectiveScore

        getProperty, getScore

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • allDifferentValues

        protected boolean allDifferentValues(Cell[] cellArray)
        The method that controls if in an array of Cells all values or colours of the dice are different, and there are no empty cells.
        Parameters:
        cellArray - the array.
        Returns:
        true if all cells are not null and have dice with different values or colours, false otherwise.
